name: LeadershipGurubyLifeMAPP
0:
”Alexa, ask Leadership Guru for a random fact”
”today's word”
”today's lesson”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: leadership guru
des:
Welcome to Leadership Guru by LifeMAPP. By simply asking, "Alexa, open Leadership Guru" or "Alexa, ask Leadership Guru for a random fact" you can access some of our inspiring lessons on becoming a leader.

Tweet @lifemapp if you have any fun ideas or needs you'd like to see grow in this Alexa skill and we'd be happy to review it as we add new content weekly.

We will be growing this Alexa Skill quickly (May 2017) to include new features that allow you to ask Alexa direct questions about your leadership needs.

LifeMAPP is a global mentoring organization whose primary goal is to bring inspiration and beneficial change to the lives of those who seek to improve their surroundings and support.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
